# LinkWithArrowIcon
**SUBCATEGORY:** Navigation

<hr />

## Link with arrow icon
### Description
For drawing attention to important links.

<Playground>
  <LinkWithArrowIcon
    text='Link with arrow icon'
    href='/'
  />
</Playground>
